channel.title: FreezScape [525]
channel.description:
[center]hello guys, im done whit my 317 server ( not releasing ) and started now whit 525, base jc-scape pvp.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/72g5zp.png[/img][/center]
[left][font=Kristen Itc]Update log;
- Almost all specials added. 17/04/'09 - Banking. 17/04/'09 - Fixed Hp Bar 18/04/'09 - Bounty hunter only high crater. 18/04/'09 - Home teleport and bh teleport. 18/04/'09 - Perfect prayer switching. 19/04/'09 - Ice blitz, ice barrage,miasmic barrage works 100%. 19/04/'09 - 99% 525 emotes. 19/04/'09 - Over 100 PVP Drops Added. 20/04/'09 - 100% Dharok Effects 20/04/'09 - Special Bar 100% 21/04/'09 - Special Bar Draining 100% 21/04/'09 - Special Bar Refilling 100% 21/04/'09 - started Trading, works 80% i think. 22/04/'09 - Started Clan Chat works greaaat. 23/04/'09 - added ::char 23/04/'09 - Added Pvp lvl like real rs! 23/04/'09 - Attacking npc ( you only hit 0's somethies :s need to fix ) 23/04/'09 - Trading works in HD too 24/04/'09 - HD is full screen works with Interfaces 24/04/'09 - Magic on npc finally :) 25/04/'09 - changed home 25/04/'09 - Npc dialogue 26/04/'09 - Level Up interface ( 115Xp per hit ) 26/04/'09 - Removed pvp, pvp is only at edge,varrock,falador & you lose in wildy & Bounty hunter ALL stuff . 01/05/'09 - bank booths at home for bankin. 03/05/'09 - Gmaul Special but dont works 100%. 03/05/'09 and many,many more.
Coming updates :
Shop guna start soon range on npc gonna start if im done whit shop. Teleblock more town & cities
& more :rolleyes: [/font][/left] [center] Lets start whit some pictures :
Some specials,magic& other
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/s13vxt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/4h9sa0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/b9hxl0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2jetra8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/fviu4n.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/akygiv.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/xptjt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2exned2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/9un3mx.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/oaxcmu.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/fw3tqw.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2h2qayt.png[/img]
i post tomorrow more pics.
credits;
Dragonscape for client Jc-scape for base Me my irl friend helped whit hd screen & trading (l) :) Some tutorials ( 3-5 i think ) if i forgot you reply
[/center]

[center]hello guys, im done whit my 317 server ( not releasing ) and started now whit 525, base jc-scape pvp.

[/center]

[left][font=Kristen Itc]Update log;

  • Almost all specials added. 17/04/'09
